article_title: Drunk driver slams into Clayton patrol car
article_text:
You must enter the characters with black color that stand out from the other characters

Message: * A friend wanted you to see this item from WRAL.com: http://wral.com/13220406

— A Clayton woman has been charged with driving while impaired after she rear-ended a parked police cruiser with its blue lights flashing and siren blaring, police said Monday.

Charae Chantel Wallace, 22, of 208 Wexford Drive, also was charged with failure to reduce speed and failing to heed blue lights and siren.

Police said a Clayton officer had stopped on Barbour Mill Road Saturday morning to investigate a suspicious person when his patrol car was struck from behind. The officer suffered minor injuries, but the patrol car sustained major damage, police said.
